sections.label: Verse 1
content: You know you drive me up a wall the way you make good of all the nasty
tricks you pull. Seems like we're makin' up more than we're makin'
love and it always seems you got somn' on your mind other than me
Girl, you got to change your crazy ways, you hear me

sections.label: Verse 2
content: Say you're leavin' on a seven thirty train and that you're headin' out
Girl you been givin' me that line so many times it kinda gets like

sections.label: Bridge 1
content: That kinda lovin' turns a man to a slave
That kinda lovin' sends a man right to his grave

sections.label: Chorus 1
content: I go crazy, crazy, baby, I go crazy
You turn it on, then you're gone, yeah, you drive me
Crazy, crazy, crazy for you baby
Bm E C#m F#m E D Dm
What can I do, honey, I feel like the color blue

sections.label: Verse 3
content: You're packin' up your stuff and talkin' like it's tough and tryin' to
tell me that it's time to go, yeah
But I know you ain't wearin' nothin' underneath that overcoat
And it's all a show, yeah

sections.label: Bridge 2
content: That kinda lovin' makes me wanna pull down the shade, yeah
That kinda lovin' yeah now I'm never, never, never, never

sections.label: Chorus 2
content: I go crazy, crazy, baby, I go crazy
You turn it on, then you're gone, yeah, you drive me
Crazy, crazy, crazy for you baby
Bm E C#m F#m E D Dm
What can I do, honey, I feel like the color blue
I'm losin' my mind, girl, 'cause I'm goin' crazy

sections.label: Bridge 3
content: I need your love, honey yeah

sections.label: Chorus 3
content: Crazy, crazy, crazy for you baby
I'm losin' my mind, girl 'cause I'm goin' crazy
Crazy, crazy, crazy for you baby
You turn it on, then you're gone, yeah, you drive me
